title: Learning Analytics-Based Educational Intervention Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Providing practice-centered education in simulation/VR environments to enable practitioners to analyze learning data in real work contexts and design educational intervention strategies

learning_goals: Learners analyze learner engagement patterns with 80% accuracy using learning analytics tools
Learners design three or more personalized educational intervention strategies based on data-driven evidence
Learners measure a 15% or greater improvement in learner performance by applying developed intervention strategies in simulation environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
